scripts.test:all: npm run test:coverage && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:ci:all: npm run test:coverage && npm run test:ci:e2e
scripts.test:local:ci: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.artillery:run: artillery run artillery/performance-test.yml -o artillery-report.json && node artillery/show-results.js artillery-report.json
scripts.artillery:report: artillery run -o artillery-report.json artillery/performance-test.yml && node artillery/show-results.js artillery-report.json
scripts.artillery:quick: artillery quick --count 10 -n 5 http://localhost:3000/ -o quick-report.json && node artillery/show-results.js quick-report.json
scripts.artillery:ultraquick: artillery run artillery/quick-test.yml -o quick-report.json && node artillery/show-results.js quick-report.json
scripts.test:performance: npm run build && start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:3000 artillery:report
scripts.test:performance:quick: npm run build && start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:3000 artillery:ultraquick
